mapper.select: SELECT m.MBR_ID , m.MBR_NM , m.MBR_NO , c.CHKLST_NM , c.CHKLST_ID , c.INSP_TYPE_CD , st.STORE_NM , s.INSP_PLAN_DT , s.INSP_STTS_CD , ir.INSP_RESULT_ID FROM INSP_SCHD s LEFT JOIN INSP_RESULT ir ON s.INSP_SCHD_ID = ir.INSP_SCHD_ID JOIN STORE st ON s.STORE_ID = st.STORE_ID JOIN MBR m ON st.INSP_MBR_ID = m.MBR_ID JOIN INSP_PLAN p ON s.INSP_PLAN_ID = p.INSP_PLAN_ID JOIN CHKLST c ON p.CHKLST_ID = c.CHKLST_ID

SELECT m.MBR_ID , m.MBR_NM , m.MBR_NO , c.CHKLST_NM , c.CHKLST_ID , c.INSP_TYPE_CD , st.STORE_NM , s.INSP_PLAN_DT , s.INSP_STTS_CD FROM INSP_SCHD s JOIN STORE st ON s.STORE_ID = st.STORE_ID JOIN MBR m ON st.INSP_MBR_ID = m.MBR_ID JOIN INSP_PLAN p ON s.INSP_PLAN_ID = p.INSP_PLAN_ID JOIN CHKLST c ON p.CHKLST_ID = c.CHKLST_ID WHERE c.CHKLST_ID = #{chklstId} AND st.STORE_NM = #{storeNm} AND s.INSP_PLAN_DT = #{inspPlanDt}

SELECT /* StoreInspectionMapper.selectInspectionsByInspector 노승우 */ st.STORE_NM AS storeNm , st.STORE_ID AS storeId , st.LATITUDE AS latitude , st.LONGITUDE AS longitude , m.MBR_NO AS mbrNo , CASE WHEN st.BRAND_CD = 'B001' THEN 'KCC 크라상' WHEN st.BRAND_CD = 'B002' THEN 'KCC 도넛' WHEN st.BRAND_CD = 'B003' THEN 'KCC 브레드' WHEN st.BRAND_CD = 'B004' THEN 'KCC 카페' END AS brandNm , m.MBR_NM AS inspectorName , sv.MBR_NM AS supervisorName , s.INSP_PLAN_DT , s.INSP_STTS_CD , c.CHKLST_NM , c.CHKLST_ID FROM INSP_SCHD s JOIN STORE st ON s.STORE_ID = st.STORE_ID JOIN MBR m ON st.INSP_MBR_ID = m.MBR_ID JOIN INSP_PLAN p ON s.INSP_PLAN_ID = p.INSP_PLAN_ID JOIN CHKLST c ON p.CHKLST_ID = c.CHKLST_ID LEFT JOIN MBR sv ON st.SV_MBR_ID = sv.MBR_ID WHERE s.INSP_PLAN_DT = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND m.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}

SELECT /* StoreInspectionMapper.selectAllInspectionMap 노승우 */ DISTINCT STO.STORE_NM , STO.STORE_ID , STO.LATITUDE , STO.LONGITUDE , ISC.INSP_PLAN_DT , INS.MBR_NO , CASE WHEN STO.BRAND_CD = 'B001' THEN 'KCC 크라상' WHEN STO.BRAND_CD = 'B002' THEN 'KCC 도넛' WHEN STO.BRAND_CD = 'B003' THEN 'KCC 브레드' WHEN STO.BRAND_CD = 'B004' THEN 'KCC 카페' END AS BRAND_NM , INS.MBR_NM AS INSPECTOR_NAME , SV.MBR_NM AS SUPERVISOR_NAME , ISR.INSP_COMPL_TM FROM INSP_SCHD ISC INNER JOIN STORE STO ON STO.STORE_ID = ISC.STORE_ID INNER JOIN INSP_PLAN INP ON INP.INSP_PLAN_ID = ISC.INSP_PLAN_ID INNER JOIN MBR INS ON INS.MBR_ID = STO.INSP_MBR_ID INNER JOIN MBR SV ON SV.MBR_ID = STO.SV_MBR_ID LEFT JOIN INSP_RESULT ISR ON ISR.INSP_SCHD_ID = ISC.INSP_SCHD_ID
AND STO.SV_MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{currentMbrNo})
AND STO.INSP_MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{currentMbrNo})
